Description: Call of Duty: Ghosts - a new part in a series of Call of Duty. Name of the game is associated with its main characters - an elite unit of ghosts, which is served when Goust or Lieutenant Simon Riley, an iconic character of the series, treacherously killed Shepard in the second part of the franchise. The game world is close to post-apocalypse that is new to the series. In the story, due to hacking the space station, "One", a hacker launched on major cities of America's nuclear missiles. The main characters - two brothers from California who meet with Ghosts and pouring into their team in order to maintain order in the new world.

Features: Drawing a new generation: modern technology, uniting incredibly realistic characters, stunning locations, advanced lighting system and special effects worthy of the best Hollywood blockbusters.
A unique experience: the first time in the history of the series, players will take part in the battle on the side of the weaker party, when the enemy is superior not only in the number of trunks, but also on technological equipment.
Development of multiplayer games: through an updated engine Call of Duty: Ghosts will change your ideas about modes of multiplayer games. The dynamically changing maps you encounter earthquakes, floods and other events that could affect the strongest terms the tactics and strategy of battle. And advanced character editor allows players to create a truly unique fighters.
